thread.title: Patriots activate wide receiver Brandon LaFell from PUP list - Patriots
thread.title_full: Patriots activate wide receiver Brandon LaFell from PUP list - Patriots

author: boston.com
title: Patriots activate wide receiver Brandon LaFell from PUP list - Patriots
text:
FOXBOROUGH, Mass. (AP) — The New England Patriots have added receiver Brandon LaFell to the 53-man roster in time for Sunday’s game against the New York Jets.
LaFell had been on the reserve/physically unable to perform list since Sept. 5 with a foot injury.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below LaFell had a career-high 74 receptions, 953 yards and seven touchdowns last season. He added 13 receptions for 199 yards and two touchdowns in the postseason.
